reviews.subject: Introduction to Psychology
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson is knowledgeable and engaging. Her lectures are clear, but sometimes she goes off on tangents.

reviews.subject: Advanced Calculus
reviews.review: Dr. Lee is an exceptional professor. His explanations are thorough and he provides great support outside of class.

reviews.subject: Modern Literature
reviews.review: Dr. Williams is passionate about the subject, but her grading can be inconsistent and unclear.

reviews.subject: Organic Chemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Smith is knowledgeable but struggles to make the material engaging. The class is quite challenging with little support.

reviews.subject: World History
reviews.review: Dr. Brown brings history to life with her storytelling. However, the exams can be quite difficult and stressful.

reviews.subject: Biochemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Clark is incredibly dedicated and provides ample resources for students. His lab sessions are particularly helpful.

reviews.subject: Philosophy of Science
reviews.review: Dr. Turner has an intriguing approach to philosophy, but her lectures can be dense and hard to follow at times.

reviews.subject: Microeconomics
reviews.review: Dr. Adams explains complex economic concepts in an accessible way. His assignments are relevant and challenging.

reviews.subject: Astronomy
reviews.review: Dr. Green is enthusiastic and makes the subject fascinating. Her night sky observations are a highlight of the course.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Dr. Roberts is knowledgeable but his lectures can be somewhat monotonous. The course material is interesting but needs better organization.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Dr. Evans is passionate about the environment and engages students with practical projects. The course workload is manageable and rewarding.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Dr. Martinez's teaching style is not very engaging. The course is essential but could benefit from clearer explanations and more interactive sessions.

reviews.subject: French Literature
reviews.review: Dr. Cooper's deep knowledge of French literature is evident. Her class discussions are lively, though the course could use more structured assignments.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Dr. Wilson brings a wealth of real-world experience to his teaching. His insights are valuable and the class discussions are always engaging.

reviews.subject: Geology
reviews.review: Dr. Mitchell's field trips are incredibly educational and she makes complex geological concepts easy to understand. The exams are quite demanding.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: Dr. Harris is knowledgeable about music theory but his lectures can be dry. The course is challenging but essential for those pursuing music.
